title: Victorian schools to reopen next week but students must study from home if they can
description: The Victorian Government announces most students will stay home when term two returns next week, as the state's coronavirus death toll rises to 11.
content:
Updated 
April 07, 2020 09:21:19
Victoria's Premier Daniel Andrews has announced schools will reopen next week as the state's coronavirus death toll rises to 11.
State schools will reopen on Wednesday but students who can learn from home, must do so, Mr An… [+2646 chars]
